column1: 4  Section  72  also applies where the nominated successor has failed to succeed.
s Rule  1 of the Third Schedule reads as follows :

column2: The  groups of relatives  from  which  a successor  may be  nominated  for the purposes of section  51  shall
be as set out in  the subjoined table.
Title to a holding for the purposes of section 72  shall devolve on  one only of the relatives of the permit
holder or owner in  the order of priority in  which they are respectively mentioned in the subjoined table,
the older being preferred to the younger where there are more relatives than one in any group.
